details:
noun
- excessive spending
= example: excessive spending
= synonyms: prodigality, lavishness, highlife, high life
- the trait of spending extravagantly
= synonyms: prodigality, profligacy
- the quality of exceeding the appropriate limits of decorum or probability or truth
= example: the quality of exceeding the appropriate limits of decorum or probability or truth
= synonyms: extravagancy
